Sets: 7:30 & 9:30pm Reservations begin at 6:00 for the 7:30 set and 8:45 for the 9:30 set. Late night set on Friday and Saturdays from 11:30-1:30am (No cover for this set). 91892.name: Laliko
91892.releasePolicyTextSnippet: At Laliko, we invite you to experience the rich and vibrant flavors of Georgian cuisine. Our menu celebrates beloved traditions with dishes like Khinkali —succulent, broth-filled dumplings—and Khachapuri, the irresistibly cheesy, golden-baked pies. While we honor these timeless classics, we also bring a touch of creativity, offering modern interpretations designed to surprise and delight. To eleva…

92453.name: Mamali
92453.releasePolicyTextSnippet: We welcome walk-ins, but due to high demand, reservations are recommended for evenings. Located in the historic Village Cigars building, right by the famous Hess Triangle.

92844.name: Arvine
92844.releasePolicyTextSnippet: Reservations may be made through Resy up to 30 days in advance, beginning at 8:00 AM EST. For parties of eight or more, please reach out to us directly at hello@arvine.com. Cancellations or modifications can be made easily through Resy. We offer a limited number of high chairs, available upon request. A 15-minute grace period is extended for all reservations. While we do not charge a cancellation …
